import "../../style/pages/user.css" import { useStore } from "react-redux" import NameEditor from "../../component/NameEditor" import useToken from "../../utils/useToken" import { useState,useEffect } from "react" function User () { const store = useStore() const token = store.getState().token const userToken = useToken(token) const [user, setUser] = useState([]) useEffect(() => { const fetchUser = async () => { const userData = await userToken setUser(userData) } fetchUser() },[userToken]) if (!user) { return (
